meanings.definition: The act of eradicating or the state of being eradicated.
meanings.sent1: The eradications of weeds in the garden took all day.
meanings.sent2: The eradications of the virus were successful due to the vaccine.
meanings.sent3: The eradications of the pesky ants turned into a never-ending battle.
meanings.sent4: The eradications of poverty require a collective effort from the community.
meanings.sent5: The eradications of harmful habits can lead to a healthier lifestyle.

meanings.sent1: The eradications of the old building left a vacant lot in the city.
meanings.sent2: The eradications of the forest for development caused harm to wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The eradications of the birthday cake by the hungry kids happened in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The eradications of the enemy's defenses paved the way for victory.
meanings.sent5: The eradications of the invasive species restored balance to the ecosystem.
